series_description: This series consists of copies of formal or informal agreements or contracts between the Branch and other branches within the Library for services to be provided by the Branch.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after expiration or completion of agreement or contract, then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of an electronic database used to locate and control microforms in security storage with the Branch. Series includes information on records stored, production information, quality control and other related data.
retention_statement: When items permanently removed from Branch control, delete database entries. Disposal reporting onCertificate of Records Disposal(RM-3 form) not required.

series_description: This series consists of internal status reports from various subordinate units.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after end of the calendar year, then destroy.

series_title: Branch Head's Agency/Locality Files Defunct series.
series_description: This series consists of records of significant dealings between the Branch and supported agencies or localities. Series includes storage inventories, correspondence and other supporting material.
retention_statement: Transfer entire series to State Records Center. Retain in Records Center 20 years, then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of copies of court orders requiring
This series consists of copies of inventories of circuit court records compiled by field camera operators at the start of filming the vital records of that court.
retention_statement: Retain 20 years, then transfer records to the , Library of Virginia for permanent retention.

series_description: This series consists of film inspections and quality control inspection records completed by branch personnel of microfilm produced in-house, by agencies or localities and/or outside vendors.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after last action, then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of log of film moving in and out of storage in the Vital Records Vault and is used for tracking and control purposes.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after return of all related film, then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of tracing and/or printouts of temperature and relative humidity readings automatically taken in Branch storage areas. Readings are used to track efficiency of installed HVAC and related equipment.

This series consists of the history of specific duplication jobs accomplished by the Branch. Folders contain operator assignments, copies of receipts/transfers, workflow tracking, copies of agreements and other supporting documentation.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after job completion, then destroy.

series_description: This series consists of the history of specific production jobs accomplished by the Branch. Folders contain microfilm ledger sheets, job sheets, operator's worksheets and other supporting documentation. Operator's worksheets contain specific information on retakes and location of retakes that is not located elsewhere.
This series consists of copies of testing to determine freedom from residual contamination of processed microfilm.
retention_statement: Retain 3 years after receipt, then destroy.

series_title: Mormon Duplication Project Records Defunct series.
series_description: This series consists of records of the interactions between the Branch and the Church of Latter Day Saints on a program to microfilm certain genealogical records in the custody of the Library of Virginia. Series includes contracts, duplication records, inspection reports and other supporting documentation.
retention_statement: Transfer entire series to State Records Center. Retain in Records Center 20 years, then destroy.

series_description: This series documents the set up and operation of cameras and other equipment by operators. Series includes camera number, settings, jobs and other reference information.
This series documents the transfer of custody of microfilm and other vital records to the Branch. Series consists of RM-17 forms, substitutes and other supporting documentation.
retention_statement: After 3 years, scan records according to Library of Virginia's standards/guidelines; retain records in new format permanently. Destroy originals after quality control inspection verifies information was successfully transferred to new format. Document of original records after reformatting onCertificate of Records Disposal(RM-3 form).

series_description: This series consists of reports prepared by camera operators and other staff, documenting production figures for the week.
retention_statement: Retain 1 year after the end of the calendar year, then destroy.
